Package org.spongycastle.crypto.io

Classes for doing "enhanced" I/O with Digests and MACs.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CipherInputStream
    A CipherInputStream is composed of an InputStream and a BufferedBlockCipher so that read() methods return data that are read in from the underlying InputStream but have been additionally processed by the Cipher.
    CipherOutputStream  
    DigestInputStream  
    DigestOutputStream  
    MacInputStream  
    MacOutputStream  
    SignerInputStream  
    SignerOutputStream
